name: dishwasher production | dishwasher | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21883/documentation

This activity represents the production and disposal of an average dishwasher.The dishwasher is circa 50 kg in mass, has the envisaged lifetime of 12.5 years and is manufactured in Europe.The figures on material inputs from technosphere and energy required to produce an average dishwasher are taken from Fulvio and Peiro 2015. The figure on the annual production volume is from Euromonitor International 2012.

This activity starts with the reception of materials at the factory.

The activity includes the processes of material and energy use in manufacturing of an average dishwasher. The inventory additionally accounts for disposal of all materials. Packaging is not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/275:Manufacture of domestic appliances/2750:Manufacture of domestic appliances

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The literature sources used refer to the underpinning technology as being current.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average dishwasher. The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in Europe.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in Europe.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data on the material composition of an average dishwasher exclude 'other materials' as presented by Fulvio and Peior 2015 which is due to the inability to identify these. The total mass of excluded material is circa 3% of the total mass of the final product, so their exclusion is deemed justified.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Manufacturing data are taken from Fulvio and Peiro 2015. Source: Fulvio, A., and Peiro, L.T., 2015. Environmental footprint and material efficiency support for product policy. JRC Science and Policy Report EUR27200EN. European Commission, March 2015. Available from: http://publications.jrc.ec.europa.eu/repository/bitstream/JRC95187/lb-na-27200-en-n.pdf (Accessed 14 January 2018). Data on the annual production volume are from Euromonitor International 2012. Source: Euromonitor International 2012. Dishwasher production: no outlet for US volumes and tough times ahead in Europe. July 10th, 2012. Available from: https://blog.euromonitor.com/2012/07/dishwasher-production-no-outlet-for-us-volumes-and-tough-times-ahead-in-europe.html (Accessed 14 January 2018).

exchanges.description: Estimated value.The input of infrastructure is approximated with the exchange 'metal working factory', this was chosen as metal is the main material constituting the final product. The general comment for the activity 'metal working faculty, GLO' [accessed 19.01.2018] specifies: '4.58E-10 units of this process are needed to produce 1 kg of final product. Additionally, the dataset for 'metal working factory' needs to be used together with the 'energy and auxilliary inputs, metal working factory', 1 kg of this exchange is required per 1 kg of final product.

exchanges.description: Estimated value.The input of infrastructure is approximated with the exchange 'metal working factory', this was chosen as metal is the main material constituting the final product. The general comment for the activity 'metal working faculty, GLO' [accessed 19.01.2018] specifies: '4.58E-10 units of this process are needed to produce 1 kg of final product. Additionally, the dataset for 'metal working factory' needs to be used together with the 'energy and auxilliary inputs, metal working factory', 1 kg of this exchange is required per 1 kg of final product.
